Report Summary: Fight at Zamberos with minor injuries, police called
Report Resolution: 15 students and 2 staff in hospital with minor injuries, the last burrito was torn apart in the fighting
Report Text: After Zamberos got down to their last burrito a fight broke out amongst students who had been waiting in line. As other students realised that there was only one burrito left more fighting began to try and get the last burrito and a full scale riot began. Police were quickly called to the scene and managed to break up the riot before anyone was seriously injured.
